Posts.Content: 1azjewel wrote: I just had my first chemo treatment Oct. 28.   After 2 days I had severe stomach and intestinal discomfort.   Within 5 days in the hospital with severe colitis and had a horrible rash down both sides of my throat and neck.  Has anyone had such a bad reaction after first infusion.  Doctor is even considering changing course of treatment, says we will deal with it as it comes.  Yeeks! Any insight, anyone? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: chemo caused colitis 1azjewel 1azjewel
